name: Shooters on fire!
description:
The game is only 50% complete. i have to add music, sound effects, characters,bullets,health bar and a lot more. This is my first game , pls show some support

Controls :

Player1:
w = up

a = left

s = down

d = right 

g = shoot

Player2:

up arrow = up

down arrow = down

left arrow  = left

right arrow = right 

L = shoot 

I hope you enjoy the game !
